channel.title: gitignore on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in gitignore on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Create the perfect .gitignore file for your PrestaShop projects
item.description: As a serious developer, you need to use versioning (or “revision control”) for your projects, in order to track changes to your files… and be able to travel back in time when a disaster happens. There are many CVS (Concurrent Versions System) available out there today, but Git is by far the most popular in 2015, and one of the most used in the Open Source world, right behind Subversion (svn).
